name: Aureole: Wings of Hope
storyline:
Join Ramila and Ryleth on their crusade to reclaim their home from demonic forces in this unique physics-based side-scrolling game.
Get ready for a celestial adventure! You are the Aureole: Move, jump, and reach dizzying speeds with precise controls that have been polished to perfection.

The kingdom of heaven, centuries after devils had been exiled to the underworld, is being conquered by the demonic army led by Lazel, the new Demon King.
Our angelic protagonists, Ramila and Ryleth, fall down from the kingdom and get stranded in the surface with a single goal in mind: It's time to return home!
summary: At sonic speeds, Aureole: Wings of Hope takes platforming to the literal skies! Join Ramila and Ryleth on their crusade to reclaim their home from demonic forces in this unique physics-based side-scrolling game.
